title: Relations (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2021 (No. 29 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Workplace Relations (Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Workplace Relations (Miscellaneous 

Provisions) Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited workplace relation (miscellaneous provisions) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: Relations (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2021 (No. 29 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 2. The 29th day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Workplace
text_raw:
2. The 29th day of July 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Workplace 
Relations (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2021 (No. 29 of 2021) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 July, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [397] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
